redemptionMethod.details: Customer cannot be issued more than 25 gift cards in a financial year. Please redeem physical products or e-vouchers if 25 Gift cards have been issued in a financial year. Any redemption above 25 cards will be rejected & points will be reversed in 45 to 90 days.
